qoutes.text: From our very first conversation, you became my comfort, my peace. With you, every moment feels like home.
Your smile was all it took to calm my nerves that day, and since then, I've never wanted to look away.
In your innocence, I found a world untouched by worries. In your bindaas nature, I found freedom.
With every step we take, I see how beautifully our lives intertwine. You are the reason my heart feels full.
II may not always get the words right, but every fight reminds me how deeply I love you.

propose.text: Through every laugh, every tear, and every challenge we've faced, I've realized one thing: you're my forever. No matter how tough the journey gets, I know we'll always find our way back to each other. With you, I've found not just love, but a lifetime of happiness.
